tool_description:
An API showing all the articles including "WWE" in the title from the following sites:
- Bleacher Report
- Wrestling INC
- Wrestling Headlines
name: WWE Articles Now
title: WWE Articles Now

api_list.name: Get WWE Articles From Individual Source
api_list.description: Gets all articles containing "WWE" in the title from an individual source
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://wwe-articles-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/bleacherreport"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wwe-articles-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://wwe-articles-now.p.rapidapi.com/news/{source}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "wwe-articles-now.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
